sentences.en: a severe form of cancer
sentences.cn: 一种严重的癌症

sentences.en: A typical training programme takes the form of a series of workshops.
sentences.cn: 一般的培训计划都采用一系列研习班的形式。

sentences.en: Application forms are available from the college.
sentences.cn: 可向学院索取申请表。

sentences.en: By midnight ice was already forming on the roads.
sentences.cn: 到了午夜，路面已开始结冰。

sentences.en: CARE was formed in 1946 and helps the poor in 38 countries.
sentences.cn: 美国援外合作署成立于1946年，为38个国家的穷人提供援助。

sentences.en: Character is not separable from physical form but is governed by it.
sentences.cn: 性格和外表是分不开的，而且观其形知其性。

sentences.en: Generosity is its own form of power.
sentences.cn: 别低估了慷慨的力量。

sentences.en: He pulls a rickshaw, probably the oldest form of human taxi service.
sentences.cn: 他拉黄包车，这可能是人类最古老的载客服务形式了。

sentences.en: His was a utopian vision of nature in its purest form.
sentences.cn: 他对大自然怀有一种极为纯粹的乌托邦式看法。

sentences.en: In English the past tense of a verb is usually formed by adding ‘ed’.
sentences.cn: 在英语中，动词的过去式通常是加ed构成。

sentences.en: In that 2.7-litre form it really was a terrific racing car.
sentences.cn: 其2.7升的车型确实是非常棒的赛车。

sentences.en: Mortimer formed up his troops for the march.
sentences.cn: 莫蒂默编好队，准备前进。

sentences.en: Most doctors appear to recognize homeopathy as a legitimate form of medicine.
sentences.cn: 大多数医生似乎都接受顺势疗法是一种合理的医疗手段。

sentences.en: Our bone marrow contains fat in the form of small globules.
sentences.cn: 我们的骨髓中含有小球状的脂肪。

sentences.en: Ozone is a highly reactive form of oxygen gas.
sentences.cn: 臭氧是一种非常活跃的氧气形态。

sentences.en: Return the enclosed Donation Form today in the prepaid envelope provided.
sentences.cn: 请于今日将随函附上的捐款表格用所提供的邮资预付的信封寄回。

sentences.en: She handed over a form, then bobbed down again behind a typewriter.
sentences.cn: 她递过来一张表格，随后又立刻埋头在打字机后面忙活起来。

sentences.en: She has the intellectual form to take up the mantle of leadership.
sentences.cn: 她具备担当领导职责的聪明才智。

sentences.en: Sulphur dioxide and nitrogen oxide combine to form acid rain.
sentences.cn: 二氧化硫和氮氧化物结合形成酸雨。

sentences.en: Swimming is probably the best form of exercise you can get.
sentences.cn: 游泳或许是现有的最佳锻炼方式。

sentences.en: The female form is a thing of beauty.
sentences.cn: 女性形体是一种美。

sentences.en: The rocks were formed more than 4,000 million years ago.
sentences.cn: 这些岩石是40多亿年前形成的。

sentences.en: The winning party will form the government.
sentences.cn: 获胜的党派将组建政府。

sentences.en: These strands of molecules twine around each other to form cable-like structures.
sentences.cn: 这些分子链彼此缠绕，形成缆线状的结构。

sentences.en: Viewed from above, the valleys form the shape of a man.
sentences.cn: 从上往下俯瞰，山谷呈现出人形轮廓。

sentences.en: Vinyl can be laid in sheet or tile form.
sentences.cn: 塑料地板分为卷材和块材两种。

sentences.en: Vitamin C can be taken in capsule or tablet form .
sentences.cn: 补充维生素C可以服用胶囊，也可以服用片剂。

sentences.en: We oppose racism in all its forms.
sentences.cn: 我们反对各种形式的种族主义。

words.tran_cn: 正式的；拘谨的；有条理的
没有形状的；无定形的；形体不明的
正式的社交活动；夜礼服
礼节；拘谨；仪式；正式手续
模型，样板；起形成作用的人
使正式；使有效（formalize的过去分词）；使定形；拘泥于形式
使形式化；使正式；拘泥礼仪

phrases.tran_cn: 艺术形式（尤指文学，绘画，音乐，民歌等）
有礼貌的；正确的姿势；良好的姿势
（运动员，运动队）竞技状态良好
(运动员、赛马等)能发挥自己的水平，竞技状态良好；精力旺盛[亦作 on top form]

trans.tran_cn: 类型，形态，外形，表格，状态
trans.tran_en: the way something is or appears to be
to establish an organization, committee, government etc
